title.rendered: Life Sciences and Biotechnology Career Fair – Oct 29, 2019

content.rendered:
ClinLab Staffing has been invited to join 60+ employers at the Life Sciences and Biotechnology Career Fair happening at UMASS AMHERST today! This is the second year we have attended this industry specific event and we are thrilled to be here among all this talent!

If you are a student or alumni please be sure to stop by and say hi and learn more about our great opportunities for scientists and scientific recruiters!

Scientists apply here!
Scientific Recruiters (join our recruiting team) apply here!
